text: The Lights of New York is a 1922 American drama movie directed by Charles Brabin and starring Clarence Nordstrom, Margaret Seddon, Frank Currier, Florence Short, Estelle Taylor. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1922 drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Brabin
title: The Lights of New York
